name: ParameterChecker_checkParameterTypeTest
description: Unit tests for the ParameterChecker.checkParameterType method.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeValid
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameterType method with a valid string parameter.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeInvalidType
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameterType method with an invalid type (int instead of String), expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameterTypeEmptyString
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameterType method with an empty string, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.
